entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
